trans-unit.source: Aiming to offer better balance between flexibility and abstraction.
trans-unit.target: Aiming to offer better balance between flexibility and abstraction.

trans-unit.source: More like a handy library of deep learning modules.
trans-unit.target: More like a handy library of deep learning modules.

trans-unit.source: Plug & play, operating directly on Theano tensors, no upper abstraction applied.
trans-unit.target: Plug & play, operating directly on Theano tensors, no upper abstraction applied.

trans-unit.source: A light weight deep learning framework
A quite light weight deep learning framework, on top of Theano, offering better balance between flexibility and abstraction
trans-unit.target: Un marco de aprendizaje profundo bastante ligero,encima de Theano,que ofrece un mejor equilibrio entre flexibilidad y abstracción

trans-unit.source: By “flexibility”, we means whether it is easy to modify or extend the framework.
trans-unit.target: By “flexibility”, we means whether it is easy to modify or extend the framework.

trans-unit.source: Common modules such as CNN, LSTM, GRU, Dense, Dropout, Batch Normalization, and common optimization methods such as SGD, Adam, Adadelta, Rmsprop are ready out-of-the-box.
trans-unit.target: Los módulos comunes como CNN,LSTM,GRU,Dense,Dropout,Batch Normalization,y los métodos de optimización comunes como SGD,Adam,Adadelta,Rmsprop ya están listos.

trans-unit.source: Compared to Keras, another less-famous framework Lasagne provides more flexibility. It’s easier to write your own layer by Lasagne for small neural network, however, for complex neural networks it still needs quite manual works because like other existing frameworks, Lasagne operates on abstracted ‘Layer’ class instead of raw tensor variables.
trans-unit.target: Compared to Keras, another less-famous framework Lasagne provides more flexibility. It’s easier to write your own layer by Lasagne for small neural network, however, for complex neural networks it still needs quite manual works because like other existing frameworks, Lasagne operates on abstracted ‘Layer’ class instead of raw tensor variables.

trans-unit.source: Easy to use and extend, support for any neural network structure.
trans-unit.target: Fácil de usar y extender,soporte para cualquier estructura de red neuronal.

trans-unit.source: Loose coupling, each part of the framework can be modified independently.
trans-unit.target: Acoplamiento suelto,cada parte de la estructura puede ser modificada independientemente.

trans-unit.source: Researchers who need flexibility as well as convenience to experiment all kinds of nonstandard network structures, and also the stability of Theano.
trans-unit.target: Researchers who need flexibility as well as convenience to experiment all kinds of nonstandard network structures, and also the stability of Theano.

trans-unit.source: Special thanks to Radomir Dopieralski, who transferred the dandelion project name on pypi to us. Now you can install the package by simply pip install dandelion.
trans-unit.target: Special thanks to Radomir Dopieralski, who transferred the dandelion project name on pypi to us. Now you can install the package by simply pip install dandelion .

trans-unit.source: The design of Dandelion heavily draws on Lasagne and Pytorch, both my favorate DL libraries.
trans-unit.target: The design of Dandelion heavily draws on Lasagne and Pytorch, both my favorate DL libraries.

trans-unit.source: The famous DL framework Keras is designed to be beginner-friendly oriented, at the cost of being quite hard to modify.
trans-unit.target: El famoso marco DL Keras está diseñado para ser orientado a los principiantes,a costa de ser bastante difícil de modificar.

trans-unit.source: The reason is more about the lack of flexibility for existing DL frameworks, such as Keras, Lasagne, Blocks, etc.
trans-unit.target: La razón es más bien la falta de flexibilidad de los marcos de DL existentes,como Keras,Lasaña,Bloques,etc.

trans-unit.source: Unlike previous frameworks like Keras, Lasagne, etc., Dandelion operates directly on tensors instead of layer abstractions, making it quite easy to plug in 3rd part defined deep learning modules (layer defined by Keras/Lasagne) or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: A diferencia de los marcos anteriores como Keras,Lasagne,etc.,Dandelion opera directamente sobre tensores en lugar de abstracciones de capas,lo que hace bastante fácil conectar módulos de aprendizaje profundo definidos en la 3ª parte (capa definida por Keras/Lasagne)o viceversa.

trans-unit.source: Use pip channel for stable release
trans-unit.target: Usar el canal de pipa para una liberación estable
Por qué otro marco de DL
todas las definiciones del módulo de red neutra
definición de todas las funciones de activación
definición de todos los objetivos de pérdida

trans-unit.source: initialization methods for neural network modules
trans-unit.target: métodos de inicialización de los módulos de la red neuronal
implementaciones modelo fuera de la caja

trans-unit.source: operations on tensor with no parameter to be learned
trans-unit.target: operaciones sobre el tensor sin ningún parámetro que aprender

trans-unit.source: or install from source to get the up-to-date version:
trans-unit.target: o instalar desde la fuente para obtener la versión actualizada:
